Taiwan minister says China coast guard triggers panic by boarding Taiwan tourist boatThe boarding of a Taiwanese tourist boat by China's coast guard triggered panic among Taiwanese people, a Taiwan minister said on Tuesday, as tensions rise across the sensitive Taiwan Strait. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 02:21:50 GMT 4KHIFI5JU5NBNP5X7IMH5GNT44 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-minister-says-china-coast-guard-triggers-panic-by-boarding-taiwan-tourist-2024-02-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
How Elon Musk's SpaceX was boosted in Indonesia by a Chinese rocket failureWhen a Chinese rocket malfunctioned shortly after launch in April 2020, destroying Indonesia's $220 million Nusantara-2 satellite, it was a blow to the archipelago's efforts to strengthen its communication networks. But it presented an opportunity for one man. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 02:06:34 GMT 66SYNYJKBRLLHL24BSTJGEWT5E https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/how-chinese-rocket-failure-boosted-elon-musks-spacex-indonesia-2024-02-20/Stefanno Sulaiman, Devjyot Ghoshal, Joe Brock技术空间
China cuts mortgage reference rate more than expected to revive property marketChina cut the benchmark reference rate for mortgages at a monthly fixing on Tuesday by more than expected, as authorities ramped up efforts to stimulate credit demand and revive the property market. China ready to work with EU to uphold free trade, multilateralism, foreign minister saysChina is ready to work with the European Union to uphold free trade, practice multilateralism, and promote an equal and orderly multi-polar world and inclusive economic globalisation, its foreign minister said during a visit to Spain. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 00:12:52 GMT DOG54DL2EFJSHJLIFVWMSOXCDQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china-ready-work-with-eu-uphold-free-trade-multilingualism-foreign-minister-says-2024-02-20/Reuters世界
Some stranded Russian Sokol oil cargoes begin to move to China, India - dataThree tankers with Russian Sokol oil that had been stranded at sea due to payment problems and Western sanctions have started to move towards China and India, data from Kpler and LSEG showed on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:55:52 GMT BR2CSSU2CZPHRHK5LZ3MV7S4UY https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/some-stranded-Russian-sokol-oil-cargoes-begin-move-china-india-data-2024-02-19/Reuters商业活力
All about Currys, UK chain China's JD.com and US fund Elliott vie forCurrys shares soared on Monday after Chinese online retailer JD.com joined U.S. activist investor Elliott Advisors in a battle to buy the British home appliance and electronics retailer, which has already rebuffed Elliott's 700 million pound ($881.79 million) opening bid.
